00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::xmlAccountList(){
00029   LOGI("Creation xmlAccountList");
00030   refresh();
00031 
00032 }

00039 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::refresh(){
00040   LOGI("xmlAccountList refresh function called");
00041   bool ret;
00042 
00043   GlobalURI gu;
00044   const char* filename=gu.getXmlAdress("players.xml");
00045 
00046   CurlFileToXml cgf;
00047   cgf.setFilename(filename);
00048 
00049   bool success= cgf.perform();
00050 
00051   if (success){
00052     loadDocument(&cgf);
00053     ret=true;
00054   }
00055   else{
00056     long resp=cgf.getServerResponse();
00057     LOGE("An error occured while getting xmlAccountList");
00058     cout << "Last server response : " << resp << endl;
00059     correctlyLoaded=false;
00060     ret=false;
00061   }
00062 
00063   return ret;
00064 }

00071 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::~xmlAccountList(){
00072   delete doc;
00073   doc=NULL;
00074   root=NULL;
00075 }
00076 
00082 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::loadDocument(
00083                                          CurlFileToXml* cgf){
00084 
00085   doc=cgf->getXmlDocument();
00086   if (doc){
00087     root =doc->RootElement();
00088     correctlyLoaded=true;
00089     LOGI("xmlAccountList correctly loaded"); 
00090   }
00091   else{
00092     correctlyLoaded=false;
00093     LOGW("An error occured while getting xmlAccountList");
00094   }
00095 }

00105 RainbruRPG::Gui::tAccountList* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00106                                   xmlAccountList::getAccountList(){
00107 
00108   tAccountList* pl= new tAccountList();
00109 
00110   if (doc){
00111     TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00112     TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "PlayerList" )
00113       .FirstChild( "Player" ).Element();
00114     
00115     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00116       
00117       tAccountListItem *it=new tAccountListItem();
00118       
00119       it->name= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00120       it->password= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Pwd");
00121       it->mail= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Mail");
00122     
00123       // Get the creation timestamp
00124       xmlTimestamp xts;
00125       it->creation= xts.getCTimeS("creation", child);
00126 
00127       // Get the confirmation timestamp
00128       it->confirm= xts.getCTimeS("confirm", child);
00129       
00130       const char* bl=getXMLTextFromName(child, "Black");
00131       if (strcmp( bl, "Yes")==0)
00132         it->blacklist=true;
00133       else
00134         it->blacklist=false;
00135       
00136       pl->push_back(it);
00137     }
00138     return pl;
00139   }
00140   else{
00141     LOGW("Cannot get a valid root element, account list will be NULL");
00142     return NULL;
00143   }
00144 }
00145 
00157 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::
00158                 getXMLTextFromName(TiXmlElement*child, const char* nodeName){
00159 
00160   TiXmlText* textNode;
00161 
00162   TiXmlNode* node=child->FirstChild(nodeName);
00163   if (node && node->FirstChild()){
00164     textNode=node->FirstChild()->ToText();
00165     if (textNode)
00166       return  textNode->Value();
00167     
00168     else  // !textNode
00169       return  "";
00170   }
00171   else    // !node
00172     return  "";
00173 }

00184 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::isAccountExisting(
00185                                                    const char* n){
00186   tAccountList::const_iterator iter;
00187 
00188   tAccountList* pl=this->getAccountList();
00189   
00190   if (pl){
00191     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00192       if (strcmp(n, (*iter)->name )==0){
00193         return true;
00194       }
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00198   return false;
00199 }

00207 tNoteList* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::getAccountNoteList(
00208                                       const char* playerName){
00209 
00210   tNoteList* list=new tNoteList();
00211   TiXmlText* textNode;
00212   const char* nodeName;
00213   tNoteListItem* i1;
00214 
00215   TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00216   TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "PlayerList" )
00217                                  .FirstChild( "Player" ).Element();
00218 
00219   for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00220 
00221     nodeName= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00222     if (strcmp( playerName, nodeName )==0){
00223 
00224       TiXmlHandle docHandle( child );
00225       TiXmlElement* noteChild = docHandle.FirstChild( "Note" ).Element();
00226 
00227       for( noteChild; noteChild; noteChild=noteChild->NextSiblingElement() ){
00228         i1=new tNoteListItem();
00229         i1->title=noteChild->Attribute("title");
00230 
00231         // Cause a segfault if omitted
00232         if (noteChild->FirstChild()){
00233           textNode=noteChild->FirstChild()->ToText();
00234           if (textNode)
00235             i1->text=textNode->Value();
00236           else
00237             LOGI("A note has no text");
00238         }
00239         else
00240           LOGI("A note element has no child");
00241 
00242         list->push_back(i1);
00243 
00244       }
00245     }
00246   }
00247 
00248   return list;
00249 }

00259 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::isAccountNoteExisting(
00260                              const char* playerName, const char* noteTitle){
00261 
00262   bool ret=false;
00263 
00264   const char* nodeName;
00265   const char* titleAttrb;
00266 
00267   TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00268   TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "PlayerList" )
00269                                  .FirstChild( "Player" ).Element();
00270 
00271   for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00272 
00273     nodeName= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00274     // We have the good player
00275     if (strcmp( playerName, nodeName )==0){
00276 
00277       TiXmlHandle docHandle( child );
00278       TiXmlElement* noteChild = docHandle.FirstChild( "Note" ).Element();
00279 
00280       for( noteChild; noteChild; noteChild=noteChild->NextSiblingElement() ){
00281         titleAttrb=noteChild->Attribute("title");
00282 
00283         // A note with this title already exists
00284         if (strcmp( noteTitle, titleAttrb )==0){
00285           ret=true;
00286           break;
00287         }
00288       }
00289     }
00290   }
00291   return ret;
00292 }

00301 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::isValidMail(const char* mail){
00302 
00303   bool ret=true;
00304 
00305   if (strlen(mail)==0)
00306     ret=false;
00307 
00308   if (strstr( mail, "@" )==NULL)
00309     ret=false;
00310 
00311   if (strstr( mail, "." )==NULL)
00312     ret=false;
00313 
00314   return ret;
00315 }

00344 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAccountList::isMailConfirmed(
00345                                          const char* playerName){
00346 
00347   tAccountList::const_iterator iter;
00348 
00349   tAccountList* pl=this->getAccountList();
00350   
00351   if (pl){
00352     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00353 
00354       // We have the good player
00355       if (strcmp(playerName, (*iter)->name )==0){
00356 
00357         // No confirmation date
00358         if ((*iter)->confirm.empty())
00359           return false;
00360         else
00361           return true;
00362 
00363       }
00364     }
00365   }
00366 }

00375 RainbruRPG::Gui::tAccountListItem* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00376               xmlAccountList::getAccount(const char* playerName){
00377 
00378   bool found=false;
00379 
00380   tAccountList::const_iterator iter;
00381 
00382   tAccountList* pl=this->getAccountList();
00383   
00384   if (pl){
00385     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00386 
00387       // We have the good player
00388       if (strcmp(playerName, (*iter)->name )==0){
00389         found=true;
00390         return (*iter);
00391 
00392       }
00393     }
00394   }
00395 
00396   if (!found)
00397     return NULL;
00398 }
